description: My path as a programmer has started at nineish years old, When one of my uncles just ask me to create for them a page for his agency of tourist, so the curiosity take me to the sea of coding by searching about this field and what programming language is, after that i fall in love with this amazing world and start creat some web mobile application untill i arrive her. In my twenty i become officially a software engineer student at national school of sciences applied Oujda, A few years later, I got an internship as a Mobile Developer. It has been more than a decade, where I'm having the chance to work with marvelous people, learning every day, traveling the world, and mainly, always making great friendships. As i start this field thankful to entrepreneurship, so the shadow of entrepreneurship follow me always, with my dreams to achieve. Nowadays, I keep seeking new skills, learning and sharing my humble knowledge as much as possible.
